#summary How to install.

= Introduction =

Compiled binary (.exe) is available for windows.
Archived source files (.tar.gz) is available for all platforms.

= Binary file =

An installer is not currently available.
Just download the exe file from the downloads page and click on it to run.
You can save the file in a folder ('C:\Program files\eepee', for example) and keep a shortcut on the desktop to run it.

= Archive =

Requirements:
  Python >= 2.4
  WxPython 
  Python Imaging Library

To install, download the archive and extract it.
Then run the setup.py as follows
  __python setup.py install__
